cocktails.name: Devonia Cocktail
cocktails.notes: You must use fresh-pressed, unpasteurized cider. The pasteurization ruins the drink.

cocktails.name: Egg nog
cocktails.notes:
Blend the eggs, slowly add the sugar. With the blender running, add nutmeg and all liquid ingredients. Chill thoroughly, even overnight.
        
From http://www.jeffreymorgenthaler.com/2009/egg-nog/

cocktails.name: The French 75
cocktails.notes: Shake, top with champagne, stir gently, garnish with a lemon spiral and a cherry

cocktails.name: The Jack Rose Cocktail
cocktails.notes: You can use lemon juice instead of lime juice, and feel free to adjust the grenadine depending on the sourness of the citrus.

cocktails.name: Knickerbocker à la Monsieur
cocktails.notes:
Virgin Islands rum is best
Garnish with other seasonal fruit as desired

cocktails.name: The Manhattan
cocktails.notes: Can use bourbon instead of rye

cocktails.name: The Pendennis Cocktail
cocktails.notes: Can substitute peach brandy for the apricot brandy.

cocktails.name: The Purgatory
cocktails.notes: From @thelancearthur, for the occasion of the final 2016 presidential debate between the "nasty woman" and wigfingers.
